{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Toxic Plate |image = [[File:Toxic_Plate_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Toxic Plate''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Poison}} }} ==Description== The '''Toxic Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Toxic Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Poison Gems]] {{Gem|Poison}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Toxic Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Lost Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Team Galactic Eterna Building|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hall of Origin|Epic}} {{LootItem|Castelia Sewers|Epic}} {{LootItem|Connecting Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Po Town|Epic}} |} |} {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
